mapper.select: SELECT R2.* FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, R1.* FROM(SELECT TREE_NO, TREE_AFTER, TREE_TAG FROM TREE WHERE (TREE_TYPE = 'A' OR TREE_TYPE = 'L') ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE) R1) R2 WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 42

SELECT T.USER_NO, T.TREE_NO, T.TREE_AFTER, M.NICK_NAME, T.TREE_TAG, T.TREE_TYPE, T.TREE_DATE, B.BOARD_TITLE, COUNT(S.TREE_NO) TREE_COUNT FROM TREE T LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON(T.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) LEFT JOIN STORE S ON(T.TREE_NO = S.TREE_NO) LEFT JOIN BOARD B ON(S.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) GROUP BY (T.USER_NO, T.TREE_NO, T.TREE_AFTER, M.NICK_NAME, T.TREE_TAG, T.TREE_TYPE, T.TREE_DATE, B.BOARD_TITLE) HAVING T.TREE_NO = #{treeNo}
SELECT TREE_TAG FROM TREE WHERE TREE_TAG LIKE '%#' || #{searchWord} || '%'

SELECT R2.* FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, R1.* FROM(SELECT TREE_NO, TREE_AFTER, TREE_TAG FROM TREE WHERE TREE_TYPE = 'A' AND TREE_TAG LIKE '%' || #{item} || '%' ORDER BY TREE_DATE DESC) R1) R2 WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 42
SELECT H2.SEARCH_TAG FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, H1.* FROM(SELECT SEARCH_TAG FROM HISTORY WHERE USER_NO = #{mno} ORDER BY HISTORY.HISTORY_DATE DESC)H1)H2 WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5

SELECT C2.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, C1.* FROM (SELECT C.COMMENT_NO, C.COMMENT_CONTENT, M.NICK_NAME, T.TREE_AFTER, TO_CHAR(C.COMMENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM- DD-HH24-MI') COMMENT_DATE FROM COMMENTARY C JOIN MEMBER M ON (C.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) LEFT JOIN TREE T ON(M.NICK_NAME = T.TREE_TAG) WHERE C.TREE_NO = #{treeNo} ORDER BY COMMENT_DATE DESC)C1)C2 WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{commentCountStart} AND #{commentCountEnd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENTARY VALUES(SEQ_CNO.NEXTVAL, #{content}, NULL, #{treeNo}, #{userNo}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT COMMENT_NO FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, C1.* FROM (SELECT COMMENT_NO FROM COMMENTARY WHERE USER_NO = #{uesrNo} ORDER BY COMMENT_DATE DESC )C1)C2 WHERE RNUM = 1
